Rules.InvariantScript:
With({SVGText:
"<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='200' height='60'>
  <text x='100' y='40' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' fill='"&cmpLoading_1.TextColor&"' text-anchor='middle'>
    <tspan dy='00'>"&cmpLoading_1.Text&"
        <animate attributeName='opacity' values='0;1;0' dur='1s' keyTimes='0;0.5;1' begin='100000.1s' repeatCount='indefinite' />
    </tspan>
    <tspan dy='0'>.
        <animate attributeName='opacity' values='0;1;0' dur='1s' keyTimes='0;0.5;1' begin='.1s' repeatCount='indefinite' />
    </tspan>
    <tspan dy='0'>
      <animate attributeName='opacity' values='0;1;0' dur='1s' keyTimes='0;0.5;1' begin='.2s' repeatCount='indefinite' />
      .
    </tspan>
    <tspan dy='0'>
      <animate attributeName='opacity' values='0;1;0' dur='1s' keyTimes='0;0.5;1' begin='0.3s' repeatCount='indefinite' />
      .
    </tspan>
  </text>
</svg>
"
},

"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(SVGText)

)
